org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Map-class creates the game map and gives methods for detecting ground and walls

        checks if tiles[x][y] is slope
        Parameters:

        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
